title: The Silver brumby (Captioned)
creator_credit: John Tatoulis, Colin South and Media World Features
brief_description: Based on Elyne Mitchell’s famous novel, “The Silver Brumby” is set in the Australian Alps, where a rogue stallion is king of the mob of horses which roam the awesome landscape. For years, the mountain men have tried to capture him, but with no success. One horseman is determined to succeed where others have failed and embarks on an unforgettable adventure. Starring Russell Crowe, Caroline Goodall and Ami Daemion.
